description: A New and Improved American Classic - Now With Bloodthirsty Zombies!Stephen Crane's classic novel of American history has been adapted to depict brother fighting against dead brother - and being devoured in the process. In this novel, the Confederate army has been replaced with an even more fearsome army of the undead called "rotters" by most soldiers. The Union army faces swarms of thousands of zombies who advance despite artillery fire and bullets. Young Henry Fleming fears he will be unable to summon his courage when his moment of truth arrives. Will he run? Will the Union army become a banquet of blue for the hungry ghouls? The answers to these questions and more lie waiting to be discovered in "The Dead Badge of Courage".
title: The Dead Badge of Courage
